credit_line: Museum purchase, Prendergast Archive and Study Center (piece found inside book that was not part of the original Prendergast Library)
title: Card from Margolis & Moss, Santa Fe, New Mexico, describing "My Lady Nicotine, A Study in Smoke"
description: Found inside A.1.220, "My Lady Nicotine: A Study in Smoke", by J.M. Barrie.
